item.title: [EDA] Local SASL SCRAM Mechanism Kafka Docker compose 구성하기
item.description: This post documents how to build a local Kafka cluster using Docker Compose that supports both SCRAM-SHA-256 and SCRAM-SHA-512 SASL authentication mechanisms, enabling secure, production-like testing for applications like event dispatchers—all without modifying code or relying on external infrastructure.
